p.codeblock: public abstract int createDataStreamEx(DataStreamConfig config, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int createDataStreamEx(int* streamId, DataStreamConfig& config, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|RtcEngineProxy") int CreateDataStreamEx(int& streamId, const FDataStreamConfig& config, const FRtcConnection& connection);
public abstract int CreateDataStreamEx(ref int streamId, DataStreamConfig config, RtcConnection connection);
Future<int> createDataStreamEx( {required DataStreamConfig config, required RtcConnection connection});

section.title: Details
section.p: Creates a data stream. Each user can create up to five data streams in a single channel.
Compared with , this method does not support data reliability. If a data packet is not received five seconds after it was sent, the SDK directly discards the data.

plentry.pd: The configurations for the data stream. See .

ul.li: 0: The data stream is successfully created.

ul.li: ID of the created data stream, if the method call succeeds.
< 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
